programme.title: Koi Aap Sa
programme.desc: A film that centers around a young man who develops feelings for his childhood friend, who is already in a committed relationship. As he tries to move on, he falls in love with another woman. However, things become complicated when his childhood friend realizes her own feelings for him.

programme.title: Salaam-E-Ishq
programme.desc: Salaam-e-ishq is a story that weaves six love stories together from different walks of life, in the bustling city of Mumbai. Ignorant about each other's existence, but end up being brought together by destiny, fate and LOVE. Set in the themes of betrayal, love and forgiveness , the film navigates the ups and downs and complexities of the modern relationships.

programme.title: Mission Istanbul
programme.desc: An action thriller film that follows the story of a journalist, Vikas, who is sent to Istanbul to cover a breaking news story. However, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy involving international terrorism and political corruption. The movie features high-octane action sequences and explores themes of courage, patriotism, and the importance of journalistic integrity in a thrilling and suspenseful plot.

programme.title: Khuda Kasam The Challenge
programme.desc: CBI officer Neetu Singh is framed for the assassination of a chief minister. She attempts to solve this murder mystery with the help of a man who is sentenced to prison for a crime he never committed.

programme.title: Partner
programme.desc: In the romantic comedy film "Partner", we meet Prem, a self-proclaimed love guru who assists people in finding their soulmates. Despite his expertise, Prem's own love life is in disarray until he befriends Bhaskar, a carefree and fun-loving man. The two become business partners and friends, and Prem coaches Bhaskar on the intricacies of romance to help him win over Naina. However, their journey is filled with hilarious hurdles and misunderstandings that test their friendship and love lives.

programme.title: Ek Thi Daayan
programme.desc: A supernatural thriller that tells the story of a magician haunted by a childhood memory of encountering a witch. When he falls in love with a woman who resembles the witch, he must confront his fears and uncover the truth about her identity. The film explores themes of superstition, fear, and the power of the mind in a spine-tingling and suspenseful plot.

programme.title: Mudrank
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Telgi Scam , How it all started & where it is as of today . Who all where involved in it. The film is an actual fictional depiction of all the real characters in reality

programme.title: Love Sex Aur Dhoka
programme.desc: An Indian anthology film that tells three separate but interconnected stories revolving around the themes of love, sex, and betrayal. The film is shot in a found-footage style, utilizing surveillance cameras, mobile phones, and webcams to capture the stories of individuals from different backgrounds, whose lives are intertwined in unexpected ways. It explores the dark side of relationships and the impact of technology on modern romance.

programme.title: Mission Istanbul
programme.desc: An action thriller film that follows the story of a journalist, Vikas, who is sent to Istanbul to cover a breaking news story. programme.title: Lal Badshah
programme.desc: A man who got separated from his biological parents at birth, grows up to become the voice of the people. His caring nature for others, eventually leads him on a dangerous journey to uncover the truth about who his real parents are.

programme.title: Apna Bana Lo
programme.desc: A widowed mother loses her child near a well during a journey on foot. Follows her emotional path through grief and acceptance as she navigates life after the devastating loss.

programme.desc: When a notorious criminal breaks out of prison, Jailer Vijay resigns and vows to arrest him. However, Shankar, a brother set on avenging his sister's death, stands in Vijay's way.

programme.desc: A young lady having grown up in a household full of love and admiration, Suraj is now a young adult who had no idea her father has been part of a dangerous mafia; she eventually falls in love with a police officer.

programme.title: Kundli
programme.desc: Kundli - is a film about values in life, which change some decisions against the will of the characters. It's about two meetings of these characters in a different time period and shows the changes that have occurred in their lives. Though along with time things have changed but there are somethingâs which are unforgettable at the back of the mind. Kundli is a film about small things that have remained though the times have changed.

programme.title: Black Coffee
programme.desc: Film director Tara uncovers her sister Vanya's betrayal in a relationship and decides to take dramatic action. In a jaw-dropping twist, Tara stages their deaths in a short film. The lines between fiction and reality blur as Tara invites her real sister for coffee after the shoot, leaving the audience questioning what is real.

programme.title: Famous
programme.desc: Once a huge superstar now faded into oblivion, submerges himself into alcohol and drugs to escape reality. One day fate makes him meet his biggest fan in an unusual circumstance.

programme.title: French Date
programme.desc: Promila, a beautiful but lonely woman in a busy city, frequently on internet dating sites, meets Arun who's also stricken with a singlehood status for his whole life. As they both decide to spend some casual time together one evening. French Date, at first feels like a normal romantic story, which it is, but soon the viewer realizes something is different. The short film shall keep the grey matter in your brain active and you might find yourself on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: Juwaa
programme.desc: Tillu, a struggling villager, gambles his wife's mangalsutra for a shot at change. Against the odds, he winsâbut discovers the real gamble is just beginning. A tale of hope, sacrifice, and the unexpected twists of life.

programme.title: Mestri
programme.desc: The man is displaying the behaviour of a thug. He receives calls similar to those of Abbas Khan. Along his journey, he follows a couple in their mid-twenties. Initially, they appear in Christian attire, then in Gujarati attire. Later, they appear in Muslim attire. one day the thug catches both of them. And he confronts them in front of Abbas Khan. At that time, there was a confrontation between the thug and Abbas Khan regarding money. At that time, the real story was revealed.

programme.title: Paath
programme.desc: In a remote village, the seed of hope and freedom is planted in the heart of a girl. Her simple dreams are shattered when a proposal arrives, but not as a promise of love

programme.title: The Footage
programme.desc: A spy dies in an elevator leaving a message on the CCTV footage. A lip-reader is called to find out what he said

programme.title: Vinyamswaha
programme.desc: You will take me for a ride in the sky, Vinay, when you become a pilot." These words have haunted Vinay throughout his life like a fearful shadow. Born into a Brahmin family, Vinay fell in love with a Valmiki girl. However, representatives of the caste-driven society, cloaked in prejudice, turned his love into a vile and grotesque joke. Today, Vinay is serving a life sentence for the rape and murder of his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Aplam Chaplam
programme.desc: Jayantika Sengupta: Rani Rahaao: Villain Zoya Sheikh: Child Sundeep Kumar: Son Vikar Tiwari: Friend of a son Sikandar Agarwal: Transgender

programme.title: Fear Of Wheels
programme.desc: This film beautifully captures the emotional interplay between the vibrant, ambitious youth and the helpless, world-weary elders, showcasing the poignant struggle between generations. As a person reaches a certain stage in life, they observe numerous things happening around them, yet feel incapable of taking action. Over time, they become reliant on others even for the most basic tasks. This narrative portrays those individuals who experience old age gradually tightening its grip around them.

programme.title: Karjdar Bhola
programme.desc: In a small village, Bhola and Komal, a struggling couple, face financial hardships. Bhola, a simple laborer, and Komal, his smart and beautiful wife, are burdened by a loan from Seth ji, a corrupt man who harasses Komal. Bhola mistakenly believes Komal is involved with Seth ji, leading to a deep misunderstanding. Eventually, the truth comes to light, allowing them to overcome their challenges and find happiness together.

programme.title: Meera
programme.desc: In this heartfelt story, a mother calls out to her daughter, only to be scolded by her husband. Her daughter, Meera, is a special child who cannot speak or hear, yet her mother sends her to school with hope. Despite the chaos and negativity around her, Meera remains blissfully unaware, finding beauty and positivity in everything. Her innocence and zest for life serve as a touching reminder of the purity within, even in a world filled with harsh words.

programme.title: Meri Bebbe
programme.desc: Based on true events, this poignant tale follows a young boy navigating life after losing his father and the unwavering efforts of his single mother to raise him against all odds.

programme.title: Panch Hazar
programme.desc: A young boy sneaks into a restricted area frequented by couples and men. He climbs the stairs, enters a room, and meets a beautiful girl. She asks him to close the door and confirm his payment. Their ensuing conversation serves as an eye-opener for men who mistreat their wives.

programme.title: Pintu
programme.desc: In a single day, young Pintu skips school, dreams of a better life inspired by a wealthy boy's shoes, and confronts the harsh realities of his underprivileged world, revealing his family's struggles and his own fragile hopes for the future.

programme.title: Ticket Please
programme.desc: Manohar Kadam, a voluntary retired man, tries hard to establish a meaningful connection with his only son Aditya but fails. Later he follows his friend Professor's advice and tries to connect with his son through a smartphone. The short film follows the Journey of Father and Son relationship in this Digital Era.

programme.title: Zindagi Ek Kashmakash
programme.desc: Zindagi Ek Kashmakash is a heart-wrenching story of a single mother, Rani, who has been abandoned by his boyfriend. Rani makes a living as a prostitute to support her only son, Ajay. Despite the harsh reality of her life, Rani is determined to provide a better future for Ajay. As Ajay grows older, he begins to worry that something is not quite right with his mother's job.

programme.title: Ae Ajnabi
programme.desc: Pappu, a misunderstood dreamer, carries a ring for the unknownâwaiting for love, waiting for meaning. On a fateful night, he meets Chandini, a mysterious stranger who changes his world in just five hours. As they share stories, laughter, and heartbreak, Pappu finds answers he never knew he needed. But was she ever real? Or just a gift from the sun? A poetic journey of love, loss, and destiny.

programme.title: It's A Match!
programme.desc: Saurabh gets a match on a dating app and enlists his friend Shobhitâs help. But when Shobhit steals the spotlightâand the girlâthings take a hilarious turn. Lies unravel, friendships are tested, and just when you think it's overâ¦ another match changes everything! A fun-filled tale of love, loyalty, and second chances

programme.title: O Re Saajan
programme.desc: Sajan Tiwari', in his mid 30s, works as a small time estate agent in Lucknow. He is involved in an extra-marital affair. His only son, 5 year old 'Bunty', catches him in the act. Scared out of his wits, 'Sajan' makes every possible effort to stop 'Bunty' breaking the news to his wife 'Manju'. The story is a humorous take on small town life, relationships and family.

programme.title: Ban Chor
programme.desc: A thief sneaks into a wealthy home for an easy heistâonly to find the wifeâs secret lover already there! But when the husband arrives, the thief and the lover must hide together, leading to a night of pure chaos, panic, and comedy. Because in this houseâ¦ "Har chor pe ek mor hota hai!"

programme.title: Uljhe Ho Kyun
programme.desc: Fitness influencer Abhayâs quirky habit of messaging his first likes leads him to Srishti, a corporate workaholic. As sparks fly, their contrasting worlds collide in a playful yet unpredictable romance. Will their chemistry sizzle or turn to ashes? A fun, fiery take on modern love.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A motherâs unwavering love gives her child the strength to face fears, embrace courage, and discover the true meaning of freedom. This inspiring tale celebrates the power of love, resilience, and the journey toward self-discovery.

programme.title: Aam Ka Achaar
programme.desc: Haunted by the riots that took his parents 20 years ago, Karan confronts the man who once loved him as a sonâyet betrayed him in the worst way. Torn between revenge and forgiveness, he seeks meaning in the madness. A powerful story of loss, betrayal, and the fight for redemption.

programme.title: Bita Hua Pal
programme.desc: The film delves into the universal question of love and compatibility. It follows the journey of a woman named Mira, who, like many others, finds herself questioning the foundation of her relationship. As she navigates the ups and downs of her own love story, she reflects on the nature of love and the challenges of maintaining a lasting connection.

programme.title: Party Bhaiya Viral Hai
programme.desc: A satirical comedy on social media, Party Bhaiya follows a young man from a small village who becomes infatuated with a social media influencer through her videos. Drawn by his growing attraction, he tracks down her location to express his feelings in person. However, this encounter delivers a jarring reality check, revealing the stark differences between her online persona and real life. But in the unpredictable world of social media, surprises await, and Party Bhaiya, his online alias, learns that appearances can be deceiving.

programme.title: Makdee
programme.desc: This is the story of a woman whose captivating beauty lures men into her world, much like a spider weaving an irresistible web

programme.title: Adarniya Mantri Ji
programme.desc: In a gripping tale, Finance Minister Supriya Chaudhry leads a crackdown on black money with her secretary, Laxman. After seizing 1200 crores, they discover 600 crores are missing. Laxman uncovers a secret plan, revealing himself as the masked figure holding the bank manager hostage. As chaos ensues and the truth unfolds, Laxman informs Supriya of their covert success, leaving viewers with a tense cliff hanger. The story ends with the title Adarniya Mantri Ji, leaving the mystery unresolved.

programme.title: The Red Suitcase
programme.desc: A lone taxi driverâs quiet routine is shattered when she picks up a seemingly innocent passenger carrying a RED suitcase. What begins as a simple ride turns into a twisted journey, as the driver uncovers chilling clues hidden inside the suitcase that lead her into the dark mystery. She must navigate the gritty streets and her growing paranoia to survive a night that will change everything.

programme.title: Love Range
programme.desc: In the bustling metro city of Mumbai, Ayush and Roohi's lives are turned upside down by the COVID-19 pandemic. When Ayush loses his job, Roohi decides to start a tiffin service to support the family, but Raj's traditional views and wounded ego create tension as he struggles with the idea of his wife being the breadwinner.

programme.title: Cycle Of Sorrows
programme.desc: Set in a rural village, this heart-wrenching story follows a poor father with a beloved daughter, who still yearns for a son as his pregnant wife prepares to give birth. Driven by financial hardship, he makes a tragic decision that not only shatters his family but leaves his relationship with his daughter and wife forever scarred. Watch this emotional tale of a fatherâs regret and the lasting impact on his family. Can he undo the damage heâs caused?

programme.title: On The Spot
programme.desc: On a fateful day, Parul hails a taxi to visit her boyfriend Ansh. Ansh, eagerly anticipating her arrival, is thrown into restlessness. However, their journey takes an unexpected turn when the taxi driver receives news of his daughter falling ill. Witnessing this, Parul's compassionate response sparks anger in Ansh. Yet, in the face of adversity, Parul's decision unfolds, offering inspiration to the youth. This is the tale of "On the Spot."

programme.title: Ransom Handsome
programme.desc: Ayan and Kabir are small time criminals involved in the kidnapping of a daughter of a dangerous mob boss, Nicole. All they have to do is stick to a kidnapping checklist and check off items as they come to pass. But their novice actions force them to interact with Nicole. Her innocent interactions result in a significantly jacked up ransom amount. Nicole manipulates the situation. Ayan and Kabir struggle to survive as Nicole starts executing her master plan to leave no witnesses behind

programme.title: Pardesi Love
programme.desc: The central theme of "Pardesi Love" focuses on a romance involving an Indian taxi driver and a foreign woman who arrives in India from Canada to meet her online boyfriend and fulfill her mother's final rites. However, the situation is far from straightforward. Jasmin intends to wed her boyfriend, Sunny, and establish a life in India, while simultaneously, the cab driver, Satya, develops feelings for her. Yet, the complexities of their relationships and interactions form the crux of the film's narrative, showcasing the dynamic among these three individuals.

programme.title: Nazariyaa
programme.desc: Mihika, a 22 year old, fights with her dad yet again over going out late at night. She finds it very unreasonable of him to be so worried now that sheâs 22. Waiting for her cab, she overhears her buildingâs supervisor talking on a phone call with his own daughter. She steps in and debates with him about how he shouldnât be upset about her being out late at night but understands his perspective too in the process. She then goes back home to apologise and reconcile with her dad. The supervisor also understands his daughterâs situation better through this chance encounter.

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: When Nidhi visits an orphanage with hopes of adopting, she is confronted by the unresolved trauma of losing her own child to kidnapping. As she battles grief and depression, she must find a way to heal and embrace life again. A poignant tale of loss, resilience, and the power of hope.

programme.title: Share Baazaar
programme.desc: A satirical mockumentary that dives into the wild world of stock markets, where retail traders chase dreams, operators outsmart the game, and finfluencers sell hope (and courses). SHARE BAZAAR: Yahaan Sabhi Gyaani Hain is a sharp, hilarious take on the madness behind the money.

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: One evening, Dhirendra (40 yrs.) is eager to head home, yet the taxi driver is awaiting additional passengers. Eventually, a lone passenger arrives, prompting the taxi to proceed. As the driver requests fares and mentions a lack of change, a comedic spectacle ensues between the passengers and the driver. Ultimately, the narrative takes a humorous twist, concluding with a happy ending.

programme.title: Khwahishon Ki Car
programme.desc: A newlywed longs to drive her dowry car, but is stalled by her husband's ego and her mother-in-lawâs control. The Driverâs Seat is a quiet rebellion about agency, freedom, and the fight to take controlâon the road and in life.

programme.title: 23 B Raheja
programme.desc: 23B Raheja is a gripping one-night drama that peels back the glossy layers of the entertainment industry to expose the shadows lurking beneath. The story revolves around a celebrated casting director whose charm masks a long trail of manipulation and exploitation. His power begins to crumble when a young woman arrives at his door, posing as an aspiring actressâbut with a haunting connection to his past. As the night unfolds, so does a tense game of revelations, where truth becomes confrontation and justice takes an unexpected form. Taut, timely, and unsettlingly real, 23B Raheja is not just a story of reckoningâitâs a mirror held up to the systems we too often ignore.

programme.title: Ghar
programme.desc: Isaac, a 15-year-old boy, is trapped in the trauma of his parents' separation, leading him to lose his passion for music. His grandmother advises him to revisit his passion and meet Naomi, a retired singer. How he finds beauty in his brokenness, follows the crux of the story.

programme.title: Barking Bruno
programme.desc: Barking Bruno sheds light on the reality of modern life, where we often prefer pets over parents, viewing them as burdens. Rohit, content with his dog Bruno, contrasts sharply with his treatment of his father, Mr. Mehra, who feels neglected. However, when Mr. Mehra meets Bruno, his life takes an unexpected turn, albeit temporarily

programme.title: Rishtey
programme.desc: Ria, a rising model, and Juhi, a top creative director, share an unbreakable bondâuntil ace photographer Vicky enters their lives. As passion and ambition collide, their friendship is put to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Gunjaaish
programme.desc: A heartfelt journey of a couple raising a child with autism, discovering the power of love, resilience, and community. Featuring autistic actors, this ground breaking film celebrates acceptance and the beauty of being different.

programme.title: Pendulum
programme.desc: After losing his fiancÃ©e, Vishu is drowning in grief, unable to see a way forward. On the verge of giving up, a mysterious encounter changes everything, offering him a new perspective on life. Will he embrace the second chance fate has given him?

programme.title: Hum Types
programme.desc: Charu, a girl from high society, faces her own struggles. One night, she meets Makrand, a boy from a low social class. Initially, their class difference creates a barrier, but as they spend time together, Charu realizes they share more similarities than differences. Through moments of vulnerability and connection, they discover their common humanity.

programme.title: Blame Game
programme.desc: A woman sits alone on a beach, lost in thought, until a stranger joins her, sparking a conversation that reveals a story about love, relationships, and the bitterness they can sometimes bring. She describes a once-loving bond that, over time, turned painful, leaving lasting scars.

programme.title: Passbook
programme.desc: Set in the 90's when ATM and instant money transfer were still many years far away. In order to withdraw money people had to rely on a lengthy process of MT or Money Transfer which contained a bank to bank secret code.

programme.title: L'idiot
programme.desc: LâIdiot tells the story of Rinku, a young, eccentric man who is captivated by French culture and hopelessly infatuated with Mona, a charismatic and free-spirited girl in his language class. His romantic fantasies and attempts to impress Mona take a comedic yet dark twist when he encounters a mysterious âthief,â who manipulates Rinku into a dubious scheme to win Monaâs affection. Rinkuâs innocent longing for friendship and love leads him into an awkward and ultimately dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: The Perception
programme.desc: This story follows the journey of a professional photographer and a poor cycle rickshaw driver in Mumbai at the end of spring. Through various incidents on the road, their perceptions of each other change, highlighting the contrast between their social statuses. Ultimately, their experiences weave together to create a beautiful narrative of understanding and connection.

programme.title: Fried
programme.desc: In Mumbai, newlyweds Tanya and Rajat struggle after she loses her job. As financial strain and depression take a toll, their love is tested. An emotional journey of resilience, love, and the hidden impact of corporate layoffs on relationships.

programme.title: Writer
programme.desc: A quiet evening between a writer and his wife unravels into a surreal exploration of love, memory, and hidden truths. As reality shifts, so do the stories theyâve been telling themselvesâand each other.

programme.title: Khayaal Rakhna
programme.desc: A senior woman grapples with dementia, compelling her husband to confront challenging choices.

programme.title: Akhiri Parchi
programme.desc: This movie serves as an inspirational tool for kids, helping them grasp the extent of their parents' sacrifices and efforts to ensure their lives are comfortable and fulfilling, despite challenging circumstances. It aims to convey a powerful message, encouraging children to maximize their available resources and strive for their best.

programme.title: Suta
programme.desc: Suta (The Daughter) is the story of a bold and smart daughter who fights for the sacrifices of her mother which went unnoticed in the family. She emerges victorious and sees that her mother gains back her confidence.

programme.title: Ahsaas
programme.desc: Ahsaas is the emotional journey of Sana, a devoted wife caught in societyâs definition of a âcomplete woman.â As childlessness becomes a burden, her husbandâs support becomes her strengthâleading them to seek help and reclaim their peace, together.

programme.title: Laali (bahaar Part 02)
programme.desc: Bahaar is a haunting tale of a young bride crushed under the weight of infertility and expectations. Once cherished, sheâs slowly erasedâuntil the family finds a âsolution.â A heart breaking reflection on womanhood, shame, and broken promises.

programme.title: Sita Ram Chaddha
programme.desc: Sita Ram Chaddha's married daughter has the option to seek substantial financial assistance from her affluent brother, but her unique request ends up transforming the lives of everyone involved in unexpected and remarkable ways.

programme.title: Bahaar
programme.desc: Bahaar follows a young womanâs silent suffering inside a marriage built on expectations. Her dreams fade as sheâs shamed for infertilityâuntil the family finds a âsolution.â A haunting story of societal pressure, dignity, and the myth of the perfect marriage.

programme.title: Leaf
programme.desc: Raj and Neha, a newly married couple, move into a new house and soon begin sensing an eerie presence. Over time, they discover that the house is connected to their past lives, where they were caught in a karmic cycle of falling in love.

programme.title: Woh Khaas
programme.desc: A business tycoon bored with his monotonous work-life escapes from his corporate setup for a day and ends up meeting a girl, who like a dream changes him upside down in a real âFilmy Mannerâ. Woh Khaas is a jazzy tribute to Bollywood romances that tries to combine the reality of love and the flamboyance of Indian cinema in an entertaining and enriching way.

programme.title: Rangdari
programme.desc: An interrogation between a cop and a criminal turns into a pre-planned crime.

programme.title: Catharsis
programme.desc: A poignant journey of a man forced onto a path of self-discovery, exploring the depths of the human mind and spirit.

programme.title: Vansh
programme.desc: Dive into the powerful narrative of Vansh, a heartfelt short film from Vidyarthi Studios & Pocket Films, that explores the societal pressures surrounding gender expectations. This gripping tale follows a father's fierce desire for a son over his beloved daughter, shedding light on deep-seated beliefs and cultural traditions. As he grapples with his emotions, this poignant story opens a discussion about love, acceptance, and true parenthood. Donât miss this eye-opening film that promises to challenge perceptions and evoke empathy.

programme.title: Uljhan
programme.desc: After an unresolved breakup, Kartik and Ishita reunite for one last conversation. As memories resurface, so do the feelings. But closure doesnât always mean getting back together. Uljhan is a tender tale of emotional maturity, heartbreak, and growth.

programme.title: Broken Stars
programme.desc: An astrologer who has a fake beard is just like his profession. He is confused about the stars and how it determines anyone's future, he tricks people daily but He is worried about his daughter suffering from a disease, then one day as it happens his past somehow connects with his present which determines his future. it is a philosophical journey of a man who constantly questions the existence of sheer weirdness of the whole connection of our stars with lives and his realization

programme.title: Harela
programme.desc: A 60-year-old woman and a young man navigate tradition and modernity during the festival in Uttarakhand. Who will uphold their heritage in an evolving world?

programme.title: Raah
programme.desc: Raah is an exploration of the several stages of struggle when one steps out to pursue a dream. Sahir lives in Mumbai city with his family. The emotional and poetic narrative explores his faith, kinship and his struggle to establish himself as a poet/writer.

programme.title: The Last Date
programme.desc: A story of a husband and wife who are enjoying a romantic dinner date together that ends with a tragic climax.

programme.title: Bepar
programme.desc: A flourishing young Indian immigrant, happily married to a caring Pakistani husband, appears to lead a flawless life. However, the challenges of being in an interfaith marriage and adjusting to a foreign society might prove overwhelming.

programme.title: Taashe
programme.desc: Shiv Kothari, a village boy of 8 years is not at all interested to learn taashe (a musical instrument ), his family, and his ancestral business. What changes him so suddenly that he becomes keen to learn taashe. Who changes him so much that he decides to play taashe professionally. Watch a unique love and marriage story of two kids

programme.title: Expectations
programme.desc: The story is about a boy grappling with overwhelming feelings and contemplating drastic measures. This growing issue among the younger generation stems from unfulfilled expectations placed by society. 'Expectations' is a short film exploring the theme of emotional struggles and their severe consequences.

programme.title: Uyire
programme.desc: 'Uyire' explores the feeling of Love & how differently it is perceived from its actual implied meaning, whilst being a social commentary on the class system that is habitually rooted in Urban cities. Indrajit & Zoya, two contrasting individuals try to find a space where both of them feel respected. The film explores how an individual's upbringing, background, class, responsibilities, shapes their mindset, which ultimately leave Indrajit & Zoya at a stage of uncertainty.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Day Of Reckoning
programme.desc: John awakens from a coma to discover his wife and daughter were murdered in a brutal home invasion. Haunted by images of the attack, he vows to kill the man responsible: The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a Uni Sol in relentless pursuit.

programme.title: Poseidon Rex
programme.desc: While searching for lost treasure, deep sea divers unleash a monster that causes havoc and destruction not only in sea but also on land.

programme.title: Spytime
programme.desc: Anacleto, a former secret agent, is forced to come out of retirement and protect his son, Adolfo, when his arch-enemy, Vazquez, breaks out of prison and targets him

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Steven Soderbergh of Oceanâs 11, 12 & 13 comes HAYWIRE. A Female Assassin covert operative is hired to various global missions to perform jobs which governments can't authorize. When the operation goes awry, she needs to use all of her skills & tricks to escape an international manhunt and eliminate the last remaining link of the conspiracy against her.

programme.title: Maneater
programme.desc: While the group of friends explore a beautiful small island, all hell breaks loose for Jessie as the rogue shark sets its hunting grounds within the vicinity. A Father with a score to settle brings his war to their doorstep.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: We control the fear, you understand? Without the fear, we are all good as dead.â The notorious gangster Al Capone observed that âProhibition has made nothing but trouble,â and âI am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.â Acclaimed director delivers a thrillingly vivid slice of American outlaw history in his epic gangster tale, LAWLESS. LAWLESS is the true story of the infamous Bondurant Brothers: three bootlegging siblings who made a run for the American Dream in Prohibition-era Virginia. The film gathers an ensemble of gifted, dynamic new-generation stars â Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Jessica Chastain, Jason Clarke, Mia Wasikowska, Dane DeHaan â alongside two of the finest actors of their generations, Guy Pearce and Gary Oldman. A riveting, intense story of Crime and Corruption, Loyalty and Love, Brutality and Tenderness, LAWLESS is a rich addition to the American Gangster Canon.

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.

programme.title: Ted Bundy: American Boogeyman
programme.desc: This is the true story behind the manhunt that brought Americaâs most fearsome boogeyman to justice. His name is Ted Bundy. A specter roams the highways of the gritty 1970s America hunting for his next prey. Tracking him are intrepid FBI female agent Kathleen & Robert Ressler organizers of the largest manhunt in history to apprehend Americaâs most Notorious infamous serial killer.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A Young couple thinking about buying their perfect single family starter home. They visits a real estate agency where they are received by a strange sales agent and find themselves trapped in a surreal, mysterious, maze-like nightmare.

programme.title: Bad Samaritan
programme.desc: Bad Samaritan is a terrifying thriller of two young car valets who use their business as a front to burglarize houses of customers while they eat. Their lives are turned upside down when they rob the home of a demented serial killer after making a shocking discovery of a woman being held captive. They must choose to run and hide, or face the killer whose dark secrets they have just exposed.

programme.title: The Catcher Was A Spy
programme.desc: With an ensemble cast, this gripping, espionage thriller brings to life the true story of Moe Berg a World War II spy. His mission: go behind enemy lines in Europe to assassinate the Nazi's chief nuclear scientist before the Germans develop an atomic bomb. Berg must rely on his steel-trap intellect in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse - with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. The film follows a gorgeous young automobile fanaticize driver who becomes part of illegal drag racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

programme.title: Wrecker
programme.desc: Two beautiful young women taking a trip through the countryside, are terrorized by an unknown driver trying to run them down in a heavy duty tow truck.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: Every 23rd spring for 23days, it gets to eatâ¦Stranded on a lonely road, a school bus full of high school players must defend themselves from the Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror - ancient beast that resurfaces on the earth every 23 years to feed.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
programme.desc: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's two kids, take Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. Four Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Generation UniSol. The world's only hope is to reactivate decommissioned Universal Soldier Luc Deveraux.

programme.desc: In 1914, a young man arrives at a remote island near the Antarctic Circle to take the post of weather observer only to find himself trapped in a watchtower besieged by deadly creatures which live in hiding on the island.

programme.title: Room 203
programme.desc: Many residents of ROOM 203 have disappeared since the murder suicide of a married couple exactly fifty years ago. Lifelong friends Kim and Izzy and roommates are terrified by the vengeful spirits dwelling in their apartment. To save Izzy's life, Kim may need to sacrifice her own. Based on the Internationally Bestselling novel by Kamon Nanami.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: You canât escape them. Theyâre everywhere. They bring tears to our eyes. They make us laugh. They bring us pain. Gordon a visionary inventor of the Rememory machine that allows him to see memories. He dies in his office. Is it murder? Sam investigates by using the machine "borrowed" from Gordon's wife. He looks at memories of others involved. REMEMORY is a noir mystery Thriller.

programme.title: Out Of Death
programme.desc: From the producers of The Irishman & Lone Survivor comes this thrilling story of Jack Harris (Bruce Willis) who must tap into his killer instincts to survive the wilderness and the human predators as he tries to help a woman who witnesses a crime and finds herself running from a rural mountain town's corrupt police department after she took a video of police killing a drug dealer.

programme.title: The Free Fall
programme.desc: The Free Fall is a deeply personal horror thriller, a mind bending pressure cooker that constantly challenges us, hurling us towards one of the most shocking cinematic reveals imaginable. After attempting to take her own life, a young woman must wrestle with an overbearing husband and the only way out of this hell, is to fall into it.

programme.title: Jurassic Attack
programme.desc: A group of soldiers attempting to rescue a hostage from a terrorist crash land into unfamiliar jungles which are inhabited by a group of long hidden dinosaurs. Now they must find a way out of this isolated valley before becoming prey for prehistoric predators.

programme.title: King Lear
programme.desc: King Lear poses the question: What does it mean to be human? Its subtitle could be Being Human. Cruelty, barbarity, savagery, kindness, tenderness, love, in a world that gives not very much back. Set in the fictional present, an aging King invites disaster when he abdicates to his corrupt, toadying daughters, and rejects his loving and honest one.

programme.title: Maneater
programme.desc: While the group of friends explore a beautiful small island, all hell breaks loose for Jessie as the rogue shark sets its hunting grounds within the vicinity. A Father with a score to settle brings his war to their doorstep.

programme.title: Poseidon Rex
programme.desc: While searching for lost treasure, deep sea divers unleash a monster that causes havoc and destruction not only in sea but also on land.

programme.title: Ted Bundy: American Boogeyman
programme.desc: This is the true story behind the manhunt that brought Americaâs most fearsome boogeyman to justice. His name is Ted Bundy. A specter roams the highways of the gritty 1970s America hunting for his next prey. Tracking him are intrepid FBI female agent Kathleen & Robert Ressler organizers of the largest manhunt in history to apprehend Americaâs most Notorious infamous serial killer.

programme.title: The Good Boss
programme.desc: What makes a Good Boss? Is your boss good? Manipulative? Shamelessly meddles in his employees private lives? Crosses every line imaginable. The Good Boss is a biting character study with academy award winner Javier Bardem. To win the competition, the manipulative "good boss" unknowingly starts an explosive chain reaction with wild consequences.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A Young couple thinking about buying their perfect single family starter home. They visits a real estate agency where they are received by a strange sales agent and find themselves trapped in a surreal, mysterious, maze-like nightmare.

programme.title: Cold Skin
programme.desc: In 1914, a young man arrives at a remote island near the Antarctic Circle to take the post of weather observer only to find himself trapped in a watchtower besieged by deadly creatures which live in hiding on the island.

programme.title: Bad Samaritan
programme.desc: Bad Samaritan is a terrifying thriller of two young car valets who use their business as a front to burglarize houses of customers while they eat. Their lives are turned upside down when they rob the home of a demented serial killer after making a shocking discovery of a woman being held captive. They must choose to run and hide, or face the killer whose dark secrets they have just exposed.

programme.title: Wrecker
programme.desc: Two beautiful young women taking a trip through the countryside, are terrorized by an unknown driver trying to run them down in a heavy duty tow truck.

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: A FBI secret service agent, gets caught in a deadly cat-and-mouse game with a serial killer who knows that people will log onto an "untraceable" website where he conducts violent and painful murders LIVE on the net. The more people who log on and enter the website, the quicker and more violently the victim dies.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: Day Of Reckoning
programme.desc: John awakens from a coma to discover his wife and daughter were murdered in a brutal home invasion. programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Redline is an auto/action thriller that features an extensive exotic car collection Phantom Rolls Royce, Lamborghini Murcielago, Enzo Ferrari, Ferrari F430, Ferrari Scaglietti and two Mercedes SLR McLaren AMGs. programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: We control the fear, you understand? Without the fear, we are all good as dead.â The notorious gangster Al Capone observed that âProhibition has made nothing but trouble,â and âI am like any other man. All I do is supply a demand.â Acclaimed director delivers a thrillingly vivid slice of American outlaw history in his epic gangster tale, LAWLESS. LAWLESS is the true story of the infamous Bondurant Brothers: three bootlegging siblings who made a run for the American Dream in Prohibition-era Virginia. The film gathers an ensemble of gifted, dynamic new-generation stars â Tom Hardy, Shia LaBeouf, Jessica Chastain, Jason Clarke, Mia Wasikowska, Dane DeHaan â alongside two of the finest actors of their generations, Guy Pearce and Gary Oldman. A riveting, intense story of Crime and Corruption, Loyalty and Love, Brutality and Tenderness, LAWLESS is a rich addition to the American Gangster Canon.
